title: Exploring React Native Components
content: Initiated Chievemore's development by exploring various React Native components. Decided on using core components like View and Text for basic layout structure. -Anthony Schultz

title: UI Design with React Native
content: Dove deeper into UI design using React Native. Studied the use of StyleSheet for styling, and began implementing TouchableOpacity for interactive elements. -Anthony Schultz

title: Building AlarmListScreen with AsyncStorage
content: Developed the AlarmListScreen, utilizing FlatList for rendering the alarm list. Integrated AsyncStorage for storing alarm data persistently. -Anthony Schultz

title: Alarm Interaction with Audio
content: Focused on alarm interactions in AlarmTriggerScreen. Explored the expo-av library for sound playback, enhancing the user's alarm experience. -Anthony Schultz

title: Video Recording Integration
content: Implemented video recording in GoalVideoRecorder using expo-camera. Experimented with Camera component properties for optimal video capture. -Anthony Schultz

title: Creating a Custom Time Picker
content: Developed a CustomTimePicker component. Studied ScrollView and its properties to create a seamless time selection experience. -Anthony Schultz

title: Code Refinement and Performance
content: Refined the app's code for performance enhancement. Focused on optimizing the use of state and props in React Native components. -Anthony Schultz

title: Enhancing Alarm UI with Animations
content: Improved AlarmListScreen's UI by adding animations using the Animated component. Enhanced user feedback on alarm interactions. -Anthony Schultz

title: Advanced Features in Video Recording
content: Added advanced functionalities to GoalVideoRecorder. Studied and implemented camera switching and resolution adjustments. -Anthony Schultz

title: Alarm Notification Reliability Testing
content: Tested alarm notifications for reliability. Focused on the Notifications component from expo-notifications for consistent behavior across devices. -Anthony Schultz

title: Enhancing Time Picker Interactivity
content: Worked on enhancing CustomTimePicker. Studied the interaction of ScrollView with state management for a more responsive user experience. -Anthony Schultz

title: Setting Up for User Feedback
content: Started setting up mechanisms for collecting user feedback. Focused on integrating Modal and Alert components for user interaction testing. -Anthony Schultz

title: Implementing User Settings Page
content: Began development of a user settings page. Focusing on creating customizable options for users, including theme selection and notification preferences. Exploring React Native's Picker and Switch components for user preferences. -Anthony Schultz

title: Optimizing AlarmListScreen for Better Performance
content: Prioritizing performance improvements in the AlarmListScreen. Implementing more efficient state management and rendering techniques. Considering the use of React.memo and useCallback to reduce unnecessary re-renders. -Anthony Schultz

title: Advancements in Video Recording Capabilities
content: Enhancing the GoalVideoRecorder with additional features such as video quality settings and time-lapse recording. Investigating the integration of more advanced camera controls for a professional recording experience. -Anthony Schultz

title: Creating Reminder Pages
content: Focused on developing reminder pages to enhance user engagement. Integrated calendar view for better tracking of upcoming events and tasks. Utilizing FlatList for efficient display and management of reminders. -Anthony Schultz

title: CustomTimePicker - Next Level Customization and Accessibility
content: Planning to add more customization options to the CustomTimePicker, like different themes and layouts. Improving accessibility with voice-over support and larger touch targets for better usability. Researching user feedback to understand preferences and areas for improvement in the time picker experience. -Anthony Schultz
